trans-unit.source: (mandatory) URL or path to the running Velruse service. Please note: this must be a public URL the user must able to access. This is not really mandatory, but if not provided the login method is not displayed in the login form.
trans-unit.target: (mandatory) URL or path to the running Velruse service. Please note: this must be a public URL the user must able to access. This is not really mandatory, but if not provided the login method is not displayed in the login form.

trans-unit.source: (optional) A descriptive name of the remote service. For example: “Facebook”.
trans-unit.target: (optional) A descriptive name of the remote service. For example: “Facebook”.

trans-unit.source: (optional) URL or path for an icon that can recall the service logo.
trans-unit.target: (optional) URL or path for an icon that can recall the service logo.

trans-unit.source: A PAS plugin for Plone that authenticate users from social networks through the use of Velruse.

trans-unit.source: After Plone restart, add “Velruse authentication plugin” product to you Plone site.
trans-unit.target: After Plone restart, add “Velruse authentication plugin” product to you Plone site.

trans-unit.source: All configuration are done through the “Velruse integration settings” configuration, from the Plone control panel.
trans-unit.target: All configuration are done through the “Velruse integration settings” configuration, from the Plone control panel.

trans-unit.source: All using Velruse 1.1.
trans-unit.target: すべてVelruse 1.1を使用しています。

trans-unit.source: But Velruse support a lot of additional providers; if you want to enable more (this is true also for custom providers) you must configure the plugin, setting what data try to read by changing a configuration variable.
trans-unit.target: But Velruse support a lot of additional providers; if you want to enable more (this is true also for custom providers) you must configure the plugin, setting what data try to read by changing a configuration variable.

trans-unit.target: Velruseのインストール

trans-unit.source: Installing pas.plugins.velruse

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 序章

trans-unit.source: It is similar in some ways to Janrain Engage with the exception of being open-source, locally installable, and easily pluggable for custom identity providers and authentication schemes.
trans-unit.target: It is similar in some ways to Janrain Engage with the exception of being open-source, locally installable, and easily pluggable for custom identity providers and authentication schemes.

trans-unit.source: Just add
trans-unit.target: 追加するだけ

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind this warning taken from official Velruse documentation:
trans-unit.target: この警告はVelruseの公式文書から引用したものです。

trans-unit.source: PAS plugin for Plone. Allow users to login using social networks through Velruse
trans-unit.target: Plone用のPASプラグイン。Velruseを介してソーシャルネットワークを使ってログインできるようにする

trans-unit.source: PAS plugins configuration
trans-unit.target: NOT 設定プラグイン

trans-unit.source: Plone 3.3
trans-unit.target: プローン 3.3

trans-unit.source: Plone 4.2
trans-unit.target: プローン 4.2

trans-unit.source: Plone 4.3
trans-unit.target: プローン 4.3

trans-unit.source: Plone ecosystem already have at least one plugin for a general social authentication: plonesocial.auth.rpx. But in some environments (for example: public company or whatever use case where the user’s privacy follow strict rules) this kind of service can’t be used.
trans-unit.target: Plone ecosystem already have at least one plugin for a general social authentication: plonesocial.auth.rpx. But in some environments (for example: public company or whatever use case where the user’s privacy follow strict rules) this kind of service can’t be used.

trans-unit.source: Plus, you have two additional forms: “Users management” and “Blacklist management” to manage user’s data inside the plugin. You can delete data or enableadd the user to the blacklist. Blacklisted users can’t authenticate anymore.
trans-unit.target: Plus, you have two additional forms: “Users management” and “Blacklist management” to manage user’s data inside the plugin. You can delete data or enableadd the user to the blacklist. Blacklisted users can’t authenticate anymore.

trans-unit.source: Privacy apart, Velruse is open source* and **easilly pluggable: you can provide authentication providers for new services not covered by Janrain.
trans-unit.target: Privacy apart, Velruse is open source* and **easilly pluggable: you can provide authentication providers for new services not covered by Janrain.

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 必要条件

trans-unit.source: Right now only Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin and Google+ are automatically configured:
trans-unit.target: 現在は、Twitter、Facebook、Linkedin、Google+のみが自動設定されています。

trans-unit.source: Set of default roles automatically given to users that perform authentication with the Velruse plugin. Default to “Members” only.
trans-unit.target: Set of default roles automatically given to users that perform authentication with the Velruse plugin. Default to “Members” only.

trans-unit.source: Special thanks to Mauro Amico and Ben Bangert (for accepting a couple of mine pull requests).
trans-unit.target: Special thanks to Mauro Amico and Ben Bangert (for accepting a couple of mine pull requests).

trans-unit.source: Tested with:
trans-unit.target: テストされています。

trans-unit.target: The “Authentication services enabled” configuration is composed by a set of triplets:

trans-unit.source: The configured Pyramid route for calling auth_info. Default is
trans-unit.target: The configured Pyramid route for calling auth_info. Default is

trans-unit.source: The first section is for configuration that globally controls how Plone talk to Velruse, and other user interface options.
trans-unit.target: 最初のセクションは、PloneがVelruseとどのように話をするかをグローバルに制御する設定と、その他のユーザーインターフェイスオプションのためのセクションです。

trans-unit.source: The hostname of the Pyramid Velruse service. For example:
trans-unit.target: Pyramid Velruseサービスのホスト名。例えば、以下のようになります。

trans-unit.source: The other configuration section is relative the Velruse PAS plugin(s).
trans-unit.target: 他の設定セクションは、Velruse PASプラグインを相対化したものです。

trans-unit.source: This Plone plugin let you to enable authentication of social networks users in Plone sites, using Velruse.
trans-unit.target: This Plone plugin let you to enable authentication of social networks users in Plone sites, using Velruse.

trans-unit.source: This product was developed by RedTurtle Technology team.
trans-unit.target: この製品はRedTurtle Technologyチームによって開発されました。

trans-unit.source: Those information are used to properly configure the new login form.
trans-unit.target: これらの情報は、新しいログインフォームを適切に設定するために使用されます。

trans-unit.source: URL should be considered sensitive and only trusted services should be allowed access. If an attacker intercepts a an authentication token, they could potentially query /auth_info and learn all of the credentials for the user.
trans-unit.target: URL は機密情報とみなされ、信頼されたサービスのみがアクセスを許可されるべきです。攻撃者が認証トークンを傍受した場合、攻撃者は /auth_info を照会して、そのユーザのすべての資格情報を知る可能性があります。

trans-unit.source: URLs above can be absolute (“http://auth.yourservice.com/login/facebook”) or relative to the portal root URL by using a starting slash (“/velruse/login/facebook”). The latter will help you keeping Plone and Velruse behind Apache.
trans-unit.target: URLs above can be absolute (“http://auth.yourservice.com/login/facebook”) or relative to the portal root URL by using a starting slash (“/velruse/login/facebook”). The latter will help you keeping Plone and Velruse behind Apache.

trans-unit.source: Velruse can be executed as a separate Pyramid service and the Plone plugin needs this configuration. It will talk to Velruse using HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Velruse can be executed as a separate Pyramid service and the Plone plugin needs this configuration. It will talk to Velruse using HTTP requests.

trans-unit.source: Velruse is a Pyramid application so you must follow the proper installation instruction the refer to the Velruse setup guide.
trans-unit.target: Velruse is a Pyramid application so you must follow the proper installation instruction the refer to the Velruse setup guide.

trans-unit.source: Velruse is a Pyramid application so defined:
trans-unit.target: Velruseはピラミッド型のアプリケーションなので、そのように定義されています。

trans-unit.source: Velruse is a set of authentication routines that provide a unified way to have a website user authenticate to a variety of different identity providers and/or a variety of different authentication schemes.
trans-unit.target: Velruse is a set of authentication routines that provide a unified way to have a website user authenticate to a variety of different identity providers and/or a variety of different authentication schemes.

trans-unit.source: Why use Velruse instead of RPX service?
trans-unit.target: なぜRPXサービスではなくVelruseを使うのか?

trans-unit.source: from Facebook: fullname, e-mail and portrait
trans-unit.target: フェイスブックから:フルネーム、メール、顔写真

trans-unit.source: from Google: fullname and e-mail
trans-unit.target: Googleから:フルネームとメール

trans-unit.source: from Linkedin: fullname, e-mail and portrait (must properly configure the Linkedin API)
trans-unit.target: Linkedinから:フルネーム、Eメール、ポートレート(Linkedin APIを正しく設定する必要があります。

trans-unit.source: from Twitter: fullname, location, personal home page and portrait (no e-mail can be read)
trans-unit.target: ツイッターより:フルネーム、所在地、個人のホームページ、顔写真(メールは読めません

trans-unit.source: if Velruse run on the same server of Plone.
trans-unit.target: VelruseがPloneと同じサーバー上で動作している場合。

trans-unit.source: pas.plugins.velruse
trans-unit.target: pas.plugins.velruse

trans-unit.source: to your buildout configuration and re-run it.
trans-unit.target: をビルドアウト設定に追加して再実行してください。
